title: Boston Harbor Islands National Recreation Area: Contact Public Affairs
body: Contact Public Affairs       Each member agency of the Boston Harbor Islands Partnership maintains press relations for their agency's role in managing the Boston Harbor Islands. Contact the Boston Harbor Islands Partnership Office for parkwide and general press information:  Superintendent, Boston Harbor Islands National Recreation Area Partnership Office 15 State Street, Suite 1100 Boston, Massachusetts 02109 617-223-8667 e-mail us
